amendment.description: An amendment numbered 50 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to decrease the salary of head of the CRCL office, Shoba Sivaprasad Wadhia, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 268 (Roll no. 453).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 268 (Roll no. 453).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
